page.title: 02Hellesdon Changes
page.content: The Firs Speedway Stadium used to stand in land between Windsor and Cromer Road.The area is now taken up by residential houses and the playing fields of Firside School.Firside began its life as a secondery modern school but they became first a junior and later a middle school. The 1st World War brought the main Egerton Aircraft factories to the site on Cromer Road. Norwich Airport was originally an operational base for the RAF and during the 2nd World War an American squadron of Flying Fortresses used the airfield. During this time an American plane crashed on Hastings Avenue.
